meanings.definition: Characterized by intense feeling or passion
meanings.sent1: She had an ardent love for painting, spending hours creating colorful masterpieces.
meanings.sent2: His ardent support for the team never wavered, even during their toughest games.
meanings.sent3: The ardent puppy chased its tail with such passion that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her ardent desire to succeed burned brightly within her, driving her to work hard every day.
meanings.sent5: The ardent sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues, leaving a lasting impression on all who saw it.

meanings.sent1: The ardent fans cheered loudly for their favorite singer at the concert.
meanings.sent2: She was ardent in her dedication to helping those in need, volunteering every weekend.

meanings.sent4: His ardent loyalty to his friends was unwavering, always standing by them in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The ardent student studied diligently, eager to learn and improve with each passing day.

meanings.sent1: The ardent flames of the bonfire lit up the night sky with a warm glow.
meanings.sent2: The candle burned ardent, casting a flickering light across the room.
meanings.sent3: The ardent embers crackled in the fireplace, creating a cozy atmosphere in the cabin.
